subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The low-scoring defenseman Johnny Oduya had a goal and three assists Tuesday night for the Devils, who scored five power-play goals in a 7-3 victory over the Flyers in Philadelphia.
snippet: The low-scoring defenseman Johnny Oduya had a goal and three assists Tuesday night for the Devils, who scored five power-play goals in a 7-3 victory over the Flyers in Philadelphia.
